body.name: Side Sleeper Pillows for Adults, Neck Pillow, Cervical Memory Foam Pillow, Contour Pillows for Neck and Shoulder Pain, 2 Heights Ergonomic Pillow for Back and Stomach Sleeper (White + Foam Piece)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 14 hrs 10 mins
features: 🌛【The Partner of Sweet Dreams】Are you struggling with insomnia all night long? Do you wake up with neck cramps or back pain? Our ergonomically designed memory foam pillow has been proven to provide optimal support for your head, neck, shoulders, back and arms. The cervical neck pillow's unique contoured shape naturally conforms to your curved spine, promoting proper spinal alignment. You'll be able to comfortably shift positions throughout the night, allowing you to wake up feeling refreshed.

🌛【2 Heights+4 Butterfly Wings+ 4 Hands Areas】Our back pillow offers 2 different height options to help you find the perfect sleep posture. Its butterfly shape features 4 wings that provide armrests for side sleepers, eliminating the discomfort of numb arms. The ergonomic pillow's contour provides ample space for your shoulders and promotes healthy nasal airflow for back, side, and stomach sleepers. The vortex design at the center cradles your head for optimal support, reducing pressure on your skull and stretching your neck, ensuring a comfortable and supportive night's sleep every night.

🌛【Healthy and Safe】Our memory foam pillow features a high-quality and odorless memory foam core that ensures healthy sleep. The foam is imported from Germany's BASF and is made of the best MDI (polyurethane material) for optimal results. The foam production process is environmentally friendly and safe for humans, with no harmful effects. Our goal is to create the ultimate scientific sleeping experience. The neck pillow also comes with a double-layer breathable and removable pillowcase with a silky smooth zipper that is machine washable. The soft and breathable material is gentle on the skin and keeps you cool all night.

🌛【Ergonomic Design】Queen Size 23.94" Lx15.6" Wx (3.94/2.8)" H. Our shoulder pillow features a carefully designed ergonomic design that is suitable for most sleeping positions, including back, side, and stomach sleepers. It can be used in various settings, such as the bedroom, living room, or backyard. It can even be taken on trips and used as a bed pillow while sleeping in the car or as a back pillow while working in the office.

🌛【High-Quality Service and Guarantee】Fccabin provides high-quality customer service and after-sales support to ensure 100% customer satisfaction. If you encounter any issues, please contact us promptly, and we will respond and resolve them within 24 hours. Note: 1. There may be a slight odor when the package is opened, which is normal. You can wash the pillowcase and air out the pillow core for a few days. 2. The pillow cannot be used to treat cervical spondylosis, but it can only improve or relieve symptoms and serve as an auxiliary treatment to professional medical care.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Fccabin Cervical Neck Pillow Our butterfly contour pillow is made of premium, odor-free memory foam has a high density and slow-rebound, providing firm support for your head and neck. It's flexible enough to be folded or pressed, and keeps your head in a pressure-free state for maximum comfort.

Tips: The cervical pillow is designed for the physiological curvature of the cervical spine, which has certain benfits for maintaining the normal physiological curvature of the cervical spine and alleviating the fatigue of the cervical spine, but as a product, the neck pillow cannot play a role in treating diseases.There may be a natural foam odor upon unpacking. If the smell bothers you, wash the pillowcase before use and let the pillow core air oﬀ outdoors or near an open window within 3~7 days. The odor will go away in a couple of days.Initial use of our cervical neck pillow may cause some discomfort as your body adjusts to the new pillow. We recommend starting with a lower pillow height and gradually increasing to a higher pillow height, allowing your neck to adapt to the change. It's important to give yourself time to find the right sleeping position for your needs and to discover the perfect pillow for you.Our ergonomic pillow is imported from Germany memory foam pillow core, using the best eﬀect of MDI (polyurethane material). Due to the foaming process, the bed pillow might show small-sized bubbles on the outside. This is a normal phenomenon. Foam process, environmentally safe, with no harm to the human body, only to create the ultimate scientic sleep quality.
By adding this detachable foam piece at the bottom of the pillow to elevate the center, it can help alleviate strain on the neck.
Previous page Next page 1 High-Quality Materials 2 Machine Washable
Our pillowcase is made from skin-friendly fabric that's free of harmful chemicals. It promotes airflow to keep you cool and comfortable while also caring for your facial skin.
Pillows make great gift ideas for Mother’s Day, birthdays, Thanksgiving, Christmas, New Year’s, and Valentine’s Day to give to your loved ones.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: After first opening this I thought I would surely be returning it. Smaller than expected, plus it took a few hours to expand and reach its full size.From the very first night I have experienced better sleep and less neck soreness than with other pillows. Great purchase for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Didn't work for me
reviews.reviewText: I wasn't a huge fan of how this pillow fit me. It was well made, didn't have a foamy smell, and was comfortable. But when I tried to use it while wearing my mask it really didn't work very well -- I had to move my head so far to the edge to get to the space that it was no longer comfortable. My head isn't small, but it really seems like it's built for a larger person or for a back sleeper.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable side sleeper pillow improves sleeping quality
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. My husband didn't like regular pillows, so I got him an ergonomic one that he loved. It securely wrapped around his head and had a great neck support. It didn't have a strong smell and quickly regained its shape. It looked stylish and came with a sponge cushion to adjust the height. The quality was exceptional, giving my husband perfect sleep posture. I might get another one for my father on Father's Day.

reviews.reviewerName: The item arrived broken in half.  With a delay of 7 days.  Very bad buying experience on Amazon.
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars The pillow is very low and not comfortable to sleep on.
reviews.reviewText: The pillow is very low and not comfortable to sleep on. When you sleep on your stomach in the fall, your face swells a lot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Must have for side sleeper
reviews.reviewText: I am a side sleeper and find it difficult to find pillows to sleep on. This is one of the best. Very comfortable. The first one I slept on it I slept so good. Make sure you read the directions on where to put your head if you're sides sleeper.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very well made
reviews.reviewText: This pillow is very nice to give you support for your neck as well as your head!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I Was Skeptical
reviews.reviewText: I had searched for a pillow that would present with comfort and neck support for all positions of sleep. I was unsure if this would work! I've not regretted buying this pillow. It's everything I needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not a good fit.
reviews.reviewText: If you sleep on your side then roll over you sink in the well!
